title: Traefik Mesh Overview
description:
## Traefik Mesh

This dashboard provides a high-level overview of your Traefik Mesh instances so you can monitor related metrics

For further reading on monitoring Traefik Mesh, see:

- [Official Traefik Mesh integration docs](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/traefik_mesh/#data-collected)
  
Clone this template to make changes and add your own graphs and widgets.

definition.content: This dashboard provides a high-level overview of your Traefik Mesh deployment to help monitor your system.

**Refer to the following resources for more information**

- [Datadog Traefik Mesh documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/traefik_mesh/?tab=host#overview)

- [Available Traefik Mesh metrics](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/traefik_mesh/?tab=host#metrics)
This is an overview of service checks, monitors and connect statuses of your Traefik Mesh deployments
Traefik Entrypoint metrics provide visibility into the traffic entering your service mesh and can help you monitor, analyze, and optimize the performance and reliability of your applications.

queries.name: query2
queries.query: sum:traefik_mesh.entrypoint.requests.count{$host AND $entrypoint AND $endpoint AND code:4* OR code:5*} by {entrypoint,protocol,code,method}.as_count()

queries.name: query2
queries.query: sum:traefik_mesh.entrypoint.requests.tls.count{$host AND $endpoint AND $entrypoint AND code:4* OR code:5*} by {entrypoint,protocol,code}.as_count()

definition.content: Traefik Router metrics help you monitor and optimize the internal traffic flows between services, ensuring that your service mesh operates efficiently and reliably.

queries.name: query2
queries.query: sum:traefik_mesh.router.requests.count{$host AND $service AND $router AND code:4* OR code:5*} by {code,router,service}.as_count()

definition.content: Traefik Service metrics provide insights into how services are performing, how they interact with each other, and how they handle traffic.

queries.name: query2
queries.query: sum:traefik_mesh.service.requests.count{$host AND $service AND $endpoint AND code:4* OR code:5*} by {protocol,code,method}.as_count()

definition.content: Traefik Mesh is Golang based. The below metrics displays some Go runtime metrics that can help in troubleshooting performance or bottleneck issues.
